version_description:
1. Watch ad to double rewards after opening crates.
2. Fixed Chinese (Simplified) language support.
3. Other bug fixes and improvements.

1. New race track.
2. Improved matchmaking.
3. Minor bug fixes and improvements.

1. Increased chance of earning Epic and Legendary Crates from races.
2. Blueprint packs are now significantly cheaper to better reflect their value
3. Improved experience for first time players
4. Bug fixes and optimisations

1. New race track and cars.
2. Bug fixes and improvements.
